availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel A. Wilson (farm worker, Pendleton county)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farm worker. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Wilson and Sarah Wilson. Married to Catherine Hand Wilson in Pendleton County on September 10, 1856. Laborer in Pendleton County in 1850. Farm worker in Pendleton County in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 2, p. 327B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 47.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 36B.
